business.headline: Byju's founder told US ally to flee the US to avoid testifying: ReportThe businessman, William R. Hailer, testified before US Bankruptcy Judge John T. Dorsey, alleging that Byju Raveendran offered him a lucrative job and sent him a $10,700 plane ticket to Dubai just two days before he was scheduled to testify.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: 1st Test Day 2 Live: Yashasvi Jaiswal, KL Rahul give India steady start AUS vs IND, 1st Test Day 2 Live Updates and Reactions: Yashasvi Jaiswal and KL Rahul have a cushion of 46 runs as they aim to extend India's lead after the bowlers shot the Aussies out for 104 in the first innings.

LIVE: Mahayuti set for landslide win in Maharashtra, ahead in over 200 seats Maharashtra Assembly Election Results 2024 Live: It's result day in Maharashtra today. After a fierce political campaign, the state voted on November 8 to elect its 288 MLAs, and the counting is taking place on Saturday. The ruling Mahayuti alliance, comprising the BJP, Shiv Sena, and NCP, is locked in a fierce contest with the opposition Maha Vikas Aghadi (MVA), which includes the Congress, Shiv Sena (UBT), and NCP (SP). Both camps are hopeful of a favourable poll outcome, which will be decisive for their respective futures. The key faces in the race include Chief Minister Eknath Shinde, BJP leader and Deputy Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis, NCP leader Ajit Pawar, Uddhav Thackeray's son Aaditya Thackeray, state Congress chief Nana Patole, and Shinde Sena leader Milind Deora, among others. Exit polls have predicted an edge for the Mahayuti, while a few favoured the MVA. Stay tuned to IndiaToday.in for the latest results and updates as the counting progresses in Maharashtra.

Live: Debutante Priyanka Gandhi leads with over 1.9 lakh votes in WayanadWayanad election result live: The by-election in Wayanad was held on November 13, 2024. The contest featured Navya Haridas of the BJP against Priyanka Gandhi Vadra of Congress. Both candidates focused on development and grassroots initiatives, appealing to rural and urban voters. The Wayanad election has drawn attention for its potential impact on the region's political landscape. Both candidates have conducted extensive campaigns, rallies, and digital outreach, presenting their visions for Wayanad's future. Follow India Today for the latest updates regarding Wayanad bypolls.

Anushakti Nagar results: Fahad Ahmad, actor Swara Bhaskar's husband, leadsAnushakti Nagar results: Fahad Ahmad, husband of actor Swara Bhaskar and NCP (SCP) leader, is leading in the key Maharashtra constituency.

Anushka Sharma in attendance in Perth, cheers for Kohli on action-packed Day 2India vs Australia: Bollywood actress Anushka Sharma was in attendance in the stands on Saturday, enthusiastically cheering for her husband, Virat Kohli, during the action-packed Day 2 of the Perth Test. The star-studded moment delighted fans as photos and videos of Anushka's presence quickly went viral on social media.

LIVE: Aaditya Thackeray maintains lead after three rounds, Milind Deora trailsWorli Assembly Election Results 2024 Live: Worli witnesses a three-way contest between Chief Minister Eknath Shinde-led Shiv Sena's Rajya Sabha MP Milind Deora, Shiv Sena (UBT)'s Aaditya Thackeray, and Maharashtra Navnirman Sena (MNS) candidate Sandeep Deshpande. Mahayuti candidate Deora, who quit the Congress and joined the Shinde Sena earlier this year, is hopeful of wresting the seat from MVA's Aaditya Thackeray, the son of Uddhav Thackeray and the current MLA from Worli. MNS's Deshpande is also optimistic about a surprise in this high-profile seat. Stay tuned to India Today as we bring you all the latest updates from Worli as the Maharashtra Assembly election counting progresses.

Adani row: What the Azure whistleblowers flagged in the alleged bribery scandalFormer Azure executives, along with business tycoon Gautam Adani, have been named in unsealed court documents by the US Attorney for the Eastern District of New York and the FBI.

Mahayuti takes massive lead in Maharashtra, crosses 200 seats in big battleMaharashtra Election Results: The ruling Mahayuti coalition of BJP, Eknath Shinde-led Shiv Sena and Ajit Pawar's NCP is aiming to retain power, while the MVA consisting of the Congress, Shiv Sena (UBT) and Sharad Pawar's NCP, is aiming for a comeback.

What's behind the rise of pre-draped sarees in IndiaWearing a saree no longer demands the patience to carefully wrap it around your body, create precise pleats, and perfectly drape the pallu before stepping out to slay - thanks to the advent of pre-draped sarees.

Jasprit Bumrah runs riot vs Australia with 11th 5-wicket-haul in TestsIndia captain Jasprit Bumrah continued to run riot against Australia on Saturday, 23 November. With the wicket of Alex Carey, Bumrah completed his 11th five-wicket haul in Test cricket. This was also Bumrah's 2nd 5-wicket-haul vs Australia.

Leads are big, BJP has reason to celebrate: Congress's Supriya Shrinate Congress leader Supriya Shrinate while speaking to India Today on the early trends of Maharashtra and Jharkhand polls, said that the BJP-NDA's lead in Maharashtra is big. She said, "If the leads are what they are, then BJP has a reason to celebrate."

Diljit Dosanjh: If you want alcohol censorship in songs, do it for cinema tooIn a new video from his Lucknow concert, singer Diljit Dosanjh highlighted the disparity in censorship rules for films and songs. He also said how singers are easily 'soft targets.'

Bandra East Live: Shiv Sena's (UBT) Varun Sardesai leads by 2260 votes Bandra East Election Result 2024 Live: The Vandre East Assembly constituency, that covers Mumbai's Bandra East, is witnessing a fierce contest as NCP candidate Zeeshan Siddique takes on Shiv Sena (UBT) candidate Varun Sardesai in a high-profile electoral battle. The counting for the much-anticipated constituency began at 8 am.

Siddique, who won the seat unexpectedly in 2019 as a Congress candidate, now represents the NCP. He may draw sympathy votes following the recent murder of his father, allegedly linked to the Lawrence Bishnoi gang.

The constituency is a mix of socio-economic groups, including strongholds of the middle and lower-middle class, Muslim-majority areas like Behrampada, and affluent zones in the Bandra Kurla Complex (BKC) business district.

The Shiv Sena (UBT) aims to reclaim its former bastion, home to the Thackeray family residence, 'Matoshri,' in Kalanagar. However, with a triangular fight on the cards, it remains uncertain whether the party can overcome Siddique's momentum or if the 2019 upset will repeat itself.

Baramati Live: Ajit Pawar leads NCP (SP)'s Yugendra Pawar with more than 11,000 votes Baramati Election Result 2024 Live: The vote counting for the high-octane Baramati Assembly constituency will begin at 8 am, marking the culmination of an intense family showdown between Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar and his nephew, Yugendra Pawar, the Maha Vikas Aghadi (MVA) candidate.

Baramati has drawn significant attention since the MVA announced Yugendra, from the Sharad Pawar-led Nationalist Congress Party (NCP), as its candidate. The race pits two family members against each other, echoing a similar rivalry seen during previous Lok Sabha elections.

Ajit Pawar, seeking a seventh term as MLA, has campaigned under challenging circumstances, aiming to secure victory after a disappointing Lok Sabha performance. His campaign included an emotional appeal to voters, emphasising personal connections and his long-standing service to the constituency.  

Adding a personal touch to his campaign, Ajit Pawar's mother joined him on the trail, symbolising family unity and support amidst factional disputes within the NCP.

With political dynamics shifting and personal stakes high, all eyes are on Baramati as the results could redefine the region's political landscape.

Maha Vikas Aghadi gathers letters of support from over 160 candidatesThe Maha Vikas Aghadi (MVA) gathered letters of support from over 160 candidates, including independents, for forming the government. The counting for the 288-member assembly elections began on Saturday.
